posts.post_content: Red's a color that doesn't mind losing its minor creatures if its important ones are safe. As long as Diaochan and your major attacker are protected, go ahead and use her. Or you can play two-color and give all creatures you control shroud. Or play Diaochan in multiplayer and use her ability only when the opponent is more likely to choose another player's creature to kill then one of yours. After all, nowhere does it say the opponent who gets to destroy a creature has to be the one whose creature was destroyed.
posts.html:

posts.post_content: This is quite a flavorful card. (SPOILERS) In the Three Kingdoms story, Diaochan was an undercover agent sent by one of Dong Zhuo's enemies. Her main goal was to create a sense of distrust between Dong Zhuo and his trusted right hand man, Lu Bu. She created a love triangle so intense that Lu Bu eventually killed Dong Zhuo.

posts.post_content:
Getting rid of creatures by destroying rather than burning them is something seen only rarely in red, but the ability itself has clearly some red flavour.  
Yet unless you have a way to regenerate the creature targeted by your opponent, make it indestructible or give it wither, this card is not that playable. And trying to do so might not be worth it either.  
On the other hand, you could play her as your only creature, then destroying an opponent's theat each turn might be appealing.
posts.html:

posts.post_content:
She seems like a fine card, possibly even making Mono-Red EDH just-viable.  
She's certainly welcome in all sorts of R/U/x builds.  
  
They're reprinting her in Commander's Arsenal. I looked her up on SCG, and she doesn't seem very expensive for a Portal card, just incredibly rare. It looks to me like Commander's Arsenal won't exactly flop, but it with 7/10 Oversized cards spoiled as of this post, only [Sliver Queen](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sliver Queen) might raise eyebrows, and so far I can't find anyone but me interested in her. :(   
  
And with 10/18 Normal-Sized cards known, it looks like Blue and Black have basically been given the shaft over Green, Red and White are getting Portal Cards, and other than [Sylvan Library](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sylvan Library), [Command Tower](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Command Tower), and Silver Queen, the box is as good as From the Vault: Legends. Which isn't spectacular, just 'oh, these are nice to have in foil', plus Progenitus is decent value.  
  
So can anyone tell me, does the announcement of a Foil, regular-size... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)
